    		Tours, Appointments, and Virtual Experiences
    	An in-person or virtual campus visit is a great way to see what awaits you on campus.Register for a Tour
                        In-Person Campus Tours
                    
                    		    		
    		                You are invited to visit campus with your family! Admitted students can visit any time, but should look for specific Admitted Student Campus tours if visiting March 13–April 7.
    
                        Virtual Tours and Activities
                    
                    		    		
    		                Join an admissions counselor and current student for a live admissions presentation and virtual campus tour.
    
                        Recorridos en Español
                    
                    		    		
    		                ¡Los estudiantes y sus invitados están invitados a unirse a nosotros en una visita guiada en persona por nuestra hermosa Universidad Estatal de Chico!
    
                        Group High School/College Visits
                    Bring your class! If you do not see the date you are looking for, it may be full. Inquire with specialtours@csuchico.edu.Schedule an In-Person or Virtual Appointment530-898-6322 or info@csuchico.eduAn appointment with an Admissions Counselor can answer questions about your application, admission eligibility or transfer options. We are also prepared to share information with you about Chico State’s affordability, accessibility, student-centered community and experiential learning.When scheduling an appointment, keep in mind that weekday campus tours are 11 a.m.–12:30 p.m., so if you time your appointment right you can join a campus tour before or after your appointment with a counselor.Virtual ToursExperience campus in 360º videoExplore Chico State from the comfort of your own home. Our tour guides lead you through featured locations in virtual video experience. View our gallery of 360º video tours now.Take the video gallery tourInteractive experiencesOur curated Flickr photo albums from our award winning staff photographers show off our stunning communityTake a photo tour360 degree photos show off our scenic campus, while you listen to a tour guide.360 Campus Tour - EnglishTour 360° - En EspañolExplore Chico State at your convenience. Visit and use your phone to take a walking tour on our interactive map that leads you through the campus core.Follow our walking tourExperience community"I was looking at several universities but Chico State stayed at the top of my list. It is close to my hometown, gave me that personal attention, and provided me the college experience I was looking for in a quality university."–Kelsea Kennedy, Liberal Studies ('19)Take the Next StepsHow to ApplyTake a tourRequest InformationContact Undergraduate Admissions: Call us Monday–Friday, 8 a.m.–5 p.m., to talk directly to an admissions expert. Or use live chat during our open hours. No automated voice messages—we promise!530-898-6322, info@csuchico.edu.Graduate Studies  |  International StudentsWe acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, the Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus.We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.MenuChico State HomeAboutAcademicsAdmissionsCost & AidStudent LifeAcademic DepartmentsAthleticsAlumniParentsChico FactsGiveResourcesQuicklinksCampus CalendarCampus SafetyJob OpportunitiesAccessibility Resource CenterAnnual Security Report (PDF)
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
